overview: Scott Papador has extensive experience in technology management, starting with a long-tenure with IBM. He has led effective application development efforts for multiple clients and has a strong track-record of finding cost-effective, reliable and simple solutions to complex business needs. Scott has responsibility for development and maintenance of the MyHealthDIRECT web-based application and ensuring that customer expectations for system performance are consistently met and exceeded. Scott received his BS in Computer Science from WCTI. He has certifications in Relational Database Design, Advanced Application Design, and Project Management.
